desc: A nice dishcloth is a must for a stylish kitchen! Use a magnetic cloth holder as a simple solution for hanging your dishcloth in the sink. Just attach the two counter magnets at the back of the sink and you will have it up in just seconds, and no tools are needed!

layout.text:
A nice dishcloth is a must for a stylish kitchen! Use a magnetic cloth holder as a simple solution for hanging your dishcloth in the sink. Just attach the two counter magnets at the back of the sink and you will have it up in just seconds, and no tools are needed!
Add a stylish dish brush, fragrance dish wash, hand wash and other stylish accessories and your time in the kitchen will be so much more enjoyable!
